name: Opona
description:
So you wanna be a popstar, huh?

Strawberry Fool is the worst entertainment agency in Canada, and Mia and Noah are two of it's least talented members, but they're forced into the spotlight when their agent signs them up for an international singing reality TV show!

They'll face manipulative producers, shady editors and terrifying judges... and maybe even make some new friends along the way!

Features:

  • explore a 2D space to find fun collectibles
  • bust a move in turn-based dance battles  
  • you can dig through the trash in this game

The demo version of Opona is now available for Windows, Mac and Linux, it's around 20-30 minutes long. The full game is still in development, so if you have any feedback please let me know :)
